title: To the Lighthouse - the use of the dash indicates

content.prompt: The use of the dash in the eighth sentence of paragraph 1 indicates that

choices.label: Mrs. Ramsay has become infatuated with Charles Tansley
the narrative point of view has shifted from that of Charles Tansley to that of Mrs. Ramsay
Charles Tansley is aware that Mrs. Ramsay had become critical of him
Charles Tansley realizes that Mrs. Ramsay is no longer paying complete attention to him

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
